thread.title: Maharashtra to hike compensation for terror victims
thread.title_full: Maharashtra to hike compensation for terror victims - The Times of India

author: Priyanka Kakodkar
title: Maharashtra to hike compensation for terror victims
text:
MUMBAI: The Maharashtra government has decided to increase the compensation for the loss of property in terror attacks, riots and bomb blasts. The cabinet has also declared that victims of naxal attacks will also be eligible to compensation.
The compensation amount was last revised a decade ago. According to the decision, Rs 35,000 will be provided for repair of houses, Rs 20,000 for the repair of stalls, Rs 50,000 for four-wheelers, Rs 2,000 for bicycles, Rs 5,000 for two wheelers and Rs 5,000 for partially damaged auto rickshaws.
